channel.title: Need Graphics Artist ASAP. We got Dungeoneering, Torva, Nex, Player Owned Houses
channel.description:
Hello i'm [i]Vhenom[/i][b](Fernando)[/b] and im looking for a good development team for my server.
- Hoster [1/2] [b]We got VPS (: so 24/7 24/7[/b] - [b]Server Coder[/b] [2/3] - [i]Moderator [/i][1/4] - [i]Administrator[/i] [0/2] - [u]Co-Owner[/u] [0/1] - [b]Client Coder[/b] [0/1] - Gfx Artist [1/2] - Forum Coder [1/1] - [shadow=red,left]SERVER SPONSOR[/shadow]
[b] Application:[/b] Name: Msn: Experience: Age: Apply For: [i]And if you can, show some graphics[/i](proof)
[b]Now here is what I have to offer you![/b] -100% Lottery System with announcements and great rewards -Beautiful very advanced dicing system -Amazing gambling systems. -Full Dungeoneering (Most advanced certainly) -Working Leech Prayers [i]100.5% [/i] -Full Primal Armour, all other Dungeoneering Armour, and [b]Torva[/b], etc. -39 Waves of Jad -Custom Home at Canafis :| -Fully working Korasi's Sword, with 100% animations. -Awesome Interfaces in every Mini-Game -Fully Working Bosses Including [shadow=red,left]NEX[/shadow], Sea Troll Queen, and more! -Very Advanced Skilling. -Dragon-Fire Shield works 100% -Player Owned Shops, with Collector -Grand Exchange Option -100% working E.P. System with PvP Armour Drops -NPC's all over the land of Rehab United -New RuneScape Auto-Cast Spells -Dungeoneering Skill-Cape, with working GFX's, and Chaotics -[b]No Dupes at all![/b] Even have a program, to check for dupes. -Working Hand Cannon with great GFX's and Cannon Shots :P -Donators area with special items, places, bosses, everything!!! -Working Spirit Shields -Sarabrews, Overloads, and [font=impact]NEW POTIONS that RuneScape just realeased!![/font] -Vote4Cash commands is integrated, as well as donate command and others. -Soul Wars Capes, Soul Wars mini-game -Perfect Hybrid-ding and Switching -New Critical Hits, and Disappearing hit-marks -Fast Booting Up -New Base
[b] So that's what I have to offer you, but here is what I want to add...[/b] -100% working Grand Exchange -Soul Wars(make it better) -Better GFX's -Good Forums -Full Screen(It is already capable but it needs some fixing) -Auto-Cache Downloading and .jar making. -Make Summoning better. -Improve Dungeoneering even better! -Add more dialogues -More Interfaces -Clue Scrolls, and Caskets(already added, but needs improving)
[b]Please be aware this will be 24/7 Hosted, and that I will purchase a VPS for it.[/b]

[IMG]http://i1135.photobucket.com/albums/m628/zed159879/Justn%20new%20pics/6.png[/img] Age: 13
Apply For: GFX (graphic artist)
And if you can, show some graphics(proof)

Those are many of my old pics.

item.title: Need Graphics Artist ASAP. We got Dungeoneering, Torva, Nex, Player Owned Houses
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

NAME: Travis (or Cole)
AGE: 15
ROLE POSTIITION: Moderator
MSN/Skype: JavaTC_C@live.com/javatc_c
HOW GOOD YOU ARE 0-10: 8
HOW LONG YOU HAVE DONE THIS: Almost 2 Years
WHY SHOULD I CHOOSE YOU?

SUPERCOOLSTORYTIME

I got screwed over on a server a long time ago (got banned on my 6 month account for beating an admin in a duel [the server was project catastrophe]) and realized how bad it felt to be treated like that. I started being nice to others on my next server and after a few months, I got mod. I helped people until the server finally went down one year later. I lost contact with arround 50 friends because of it. My next server was new, so when I got mod it was for a B.S reason. I still helped people all the same for the 2 months it was up.

My last server I moderated on was up for 6 months, I was the first on, but didn’t get mod until 2 months in. In my time of this I’ve only gotten arround 7 complaints that I muted someone because they we’re mad and having a bad day and had to take it out on someone, most of them I unmuted after.

I currently administrate my cousin’s forums and moderate (op) on a minecraft server I play on.

/SUPERCOOLSTORYTIME

TL;DR:
I know how to work with people and don’t necessarily ban then just because they say I’m shit or something stupid. I have experience in the field of moderation.

Read full topic
